Articles.Content:
Hello KSP players, I have had a cool idea...

Have you ever wanted to fly a cool plane somewhere but a big ocean is in the way so you can’t mine to refuel or fly across it? If your plane has a low stall speed, and you have made a very fast boat, you can fly down very low, slow down, then have the boat match the speed of the plane. The plane just drifts down and the boat latches on to it, stops, refuels the plane, gets up to speed again, then the plane takes off.

All vehicles must be stock, pictures appreciated.
